TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Build Zebra buildings and units faster in this city.
TEXT.French: Construit les bâtiments et unités Zèbres plus vite dans cette ville.
Permet l'entraînement d'unités avec des zèbres.

TEXT.English: Instead of only being able to train Zebra units in the city you built the wonder in this building allows them to be built in any of your cities. It can only be built in the ciy with the Zebra Trainer World Wonder.
Allows the training of zebra units in all cities. Requires Zebra Trainer Wonder.
TEXT.French: Permet l'entraînement d'unités avec des zèbres dans toutes les villes. requiert la Merveille: Dresseur de Zèbres

TEXT.English: There is no evidence Zebra were ever trained for warfare. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zebra Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] building is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Non ci sono prove che le zebre siano mai state usate in guerra. L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di zebre[COLOR_REVERT] è un edificio parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tecnologie alternative[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zebra Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] is required to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zebra Chariots[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zebra Knight[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eleveur de Zèbres[COLOR_REVERT] est requis pour former des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cars de Zèbres[COLOR_REVERT] et des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chevaliers sur Zèbre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di zebre[COLOR_REVERT] è richiesto per addestrare [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carri trainate da zebre[COLOR_REVERT] e [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalieri su zebre[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This mounted unit is very powerful for early in the game and is a great counter to an enemy with catapults. This mounted unit is using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zebras[COLOR_REVERT] instead [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses.[COLOR_REVERT].

This most powerful mounted unit is particularly effective in open terrain and can withdraw from combat. It receives a bonus when attacking [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] but receives no terrain bonuses when defending. This mounted unit is using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zebras[COLOR_REVERT] instead [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses.[COLOR_REVERT].

Build this most primitive of the mounted combat units when speed is important but stay on the offensive as it gets no defensive bonuses. This mounted unit is using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zebras[COLOR_REVERT] instead [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses.[COLOR_REVERT].

This unit marks the transition from melee to gunpowder-based cavalry. The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassier[COLOR_REVERT] is the strongest land unit until the entrance of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT]. This mounted unit is using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zebras[COLOR_REVERT] instead [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses.[COLOR_REVERT].

This is the strongest pre-gunpowder unit in the game and are quite effective until [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadiers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] begin appearing. This mounted unit is using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zebras[COLOR_REVERT] instead [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses.[COLOR_REVERT].
